ValidationRule.description: Enter the satisfaction rating if the case is closed
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR(ISPICKVAL(Satisfaction_rating__c, "1"), ISPICKVAL(Satisfaction_rating__c, "2"), ISPICKVAL(Satisfaction_rating__c, "3"),ISPICKVAL(Satisfaction_rating__c, "4"), ISPICKVAL(Satisfaction_rating__c, "5")) , NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status, "Closed")) )
